name: Easy Cold Pasta Salad
author: Minnie K
summary: Great for brunch, luncheons, or whatever. Easy and quick to make. I find that this salad is always popular at get-togethers and usually disappears rather quickly...
ingredients: ¾ cup pitted black olives, sliced
directions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat
Once the water is boiling, stir in the rotini, and return to a boil
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Drain and cool by running cold water over the pasta in a colander set in the sink
Combine cooked and cooled pasta with the cucumbers, onion, tomatoes, and olives in a large bowl
Pour the Italian dressing over the salad and stir to combine
Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving
